des:
IMPORTANT: 

With the "Fastcon Smart Home" skill for Amazon Alexa, you can now interact with your devices by voice. The app associated by the skill is "Bluetooth Smart Light " which is downloaded from the Google Play and the APPstore. 

To get started:

1.Supported device
light-rgbcw

2. Sign up / sign in your App

3. Add device
Make sure the Wi-Fi device has been correctly configured in your App and you can remotely control/access it via external networks (4G/5G). 

4. Enable skill
In Alexa App, search and enable the skill "Fastcon Smart Home". Then follow the wizard to link your Amazon account to your App account. 
After account linking process is completed, discover devices in Alexa App or say “Alexa, discover devices” and make sure devices are listed and displayed as same names in your App.

NOTE: You need to discover device again in Alexa App if one of the following changes were made:
Added or deleted device,
The device has been reset.

5. Control device by voice

Now you can say to Alexa for voice control.

When using the skill, you will need to specify by name which device to use. 
For example, if you named one of your devices “Apple”, you can say: “Alexa, turn off my Apple.” 

Troubleshooting:
If Alexa returns voice the device isn’t responding, there might be because the device is offline. Please try to access the device in your App. If the App shows "Device is offline", please check your network connection until you can access the device in app.
